overview: Illustrated Aliens is a year-long project, comprising 12 animated shorts created at the end of each month. Andy Martin challenged himself to create one character a day, which culminated with 365 beautifully designed characters, showing us around their unique Planets at the end of every month. Each episode was created using a different illustration and animation technique, which makes Illustrated Aliens a really enjoyable and inventive project to watch.
title: The Planets
